cookiePreferences.title: Your Privacy Choices
cookiePreferences.description: Todd uses non-essential cookies and similar tracking technologies to measure the performance of its website and services.
cookiePreferences.toggleDescription: These activities may be considered “sales” or “sharing” under applicable US state laws. You may opt-out of these non-essential activities by using the toggle below or by visiting our website with a legally-recognized opt-out preference signal enabled, such as the Global Privacy Control (GPC). Note that requests to opt-out of these activities are unique to the browser you are using. You will need to renew your opt-out choice if you visit with another browser or device, or if you clear your cookies.
